reviewText:
Independent films usually come up short in one category or another, but this one excels on all fronts: story, acting, cinematography, direction.

I happened upon this little gem one night while dining in the Lehigh Valley, and now I'm excited that's it's available online. I already got my copy at the premiere, so now it's time to get yours!

Don't wait for the next summer blockbuster to come out; get a film with substance by getting 2 for 3.
